com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.runner

Class ServerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.runner.ServerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SeleniumFactory<com.thoughtworks.selenium.Selenium>

    public final class ServerFactory
extends Object
implements SeleniumFactory<com.thoughtworks.selenium.Selenium>
    Factory that is responsible for creating the Selenium instance and acting as a an wrapper for the start and stop methods.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerFactory(ServerConfiguration config, String startCommand)
      Construct the factory for creating Selenium instances.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.thoughtworks.selenium.Selenium create()

      Return a string to identify the browser by trimming the leading * from the browserStartCommand.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerFactory

        public ServerFactory(ServerConfiguration config,
             String startCommand)
        Construct the factory for creating Selenium instances.
        Parameters:
        config - The ServerConfiguration annotation that provides configuration for the test runner.
        startCommand - The browser start command (e.g. "*firefox").
